ch.supertomcat.bh.hoster

Interface IHostURLCheckerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdderPanel

    public interface IHostURLCheckerListener
    Listener for the Adder-Panel to detect when the URLs are parsed or to update the Progressbar.
